snippet.title: Last Chance Market Trailer
snippet.description:
When a grocery list becomes a struggle to survive against cosmic horrors, will you make it through the door?  Stay alive, solve the mystery and make your offerings - or end up on a missing person poster in this first-person, non-linear nightmare.  Better hurry, the store's closing soon.

Wishlist on Steam now!  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1869110/Last_Chance_Market/
---
Across from the Leng Forest Information Center, Last Chance Market is a trusted stop and literal last chance to buy supplies for hikers and campers heading in to explore British Columbia’s vast Coast Range wilderness.  Known by locals for its quality food, competitive prices, and quirky atmosphere, the store’s mascot, Ellie the Elk, waits outside to greet shoppers.

Stop by today and find great deals on exotic free-range game!
---
Last Chance Market is one part survival horror and one part cosmic horror mystery mind-fuck.  Built with a rich story that we're passionate about, the game rewards exploration, attention to detail and problem solving.  However, be forewarned, you will die.  Often.  But in these strange aeons even death must die.
---
We are Dark Premonition Games, a married indiedev duo that met while studying astrophysics, translating nightmares and arcane visions to help keep the stygian dirge at bay.

Find us on the web https://www.darkpremonition.com
On Steam at https://store.steampowered.com/developer/dpg/
Or join us on Discord via https://discord.gg/CKNZshEGEJ
---
Music by the amazing Karl Casey @WhiteBatAudio  - we listen to his music while working all the time.
